original_title: Uchū Senkan Yamato Dai-san-Shō: Hateshinaki Kōkai
overview: Theatrical release of episodes 7-10 of Space Battleship Yamato 2199. Deals with contact with the Galamis (Gamilon) enemy and offers an original story that delves into areas that the first Space Battleship Yamato anime did not explore.
title: Space Battleship Yamato 2199: Endless Voyage
